com.madebyaron.genai.ai

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madebyaron.genai.ai.Network
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Network
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a neural network. It holds every neuron with the connections between them.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Network(int inputNeuronCount, int outputNeuronCount, int[] hiddenNeuronCount, double initRangeFrom, double initRangeTo, long seed)
      Creates a new random network from the number of neurons.
      Network(Network parentA, Network parentB, double flipChance, double mutationChance, double mutationStrength, long seed)
      Creates a new random network by combining the two parent networks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Network

        public Network(int inputNeuronCount,
               int outputNeuronCount,
               int[] hiddenNeuronCount,
               double initRangeFrom,
               double initRangeTo,
               long seed)
        Creates a new random network from the number of neurons. Also randomises the connections using the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        inputNeuronCount - The number of input neurons
        outputNeuronCount - The number of output neurons
        hiddenNeuronCount - The number of hidden neurons as an array where each value is a layer
        initRangeFrom - The lowest initial connection value
        initRangeTo - The highest initial connection value
        seed - The seed for the random generation

      • Network

        public Network(Network parentA,
               Network parentB,
               double flipChance,
               double mutationChance,
               double mutationStrength,
               long seed)
        Creates a new random network by combining the two parent networks. Also randomises the connections using the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        parentA - One parent
        parentB - The other parent
        flipChance - The chance of a connection strength to get multiplied by -1
        mutationChance - The chance of a connection strength to mutate
        mutationStrength - The strength of the mutation (0 = no mutation, 1 = a multiplication from 0.5 to 2.0)
        seed - The seed for the random generation

      • getHiddenNeuronCount

        public int getHiddenNeuronCount(int layer)
        Returns the number of hidden neurons in the given hidden layer.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer's index
        Returns:
        The hidden neuron count

      • getLayerCount

        public int getLayerCount()
        Returns the number of layers.
        Returns:
        The layer count

      • getNeuronCount

        public int getNeuronCount(int layer)
        Returns the number of neurons in the given hidden layer.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer's index
        Returns:
        The neuron count

      • evaluate

        public double[] evaluate(double[] input)
        Evaluates the network by giving setting it's input neuron values. It returns the output neuron values.
        Parameters:
        input - The input neuron values
        Returns:
        The output neuron values
